Compares the underlying iterators.

Let {{tti|current_}} be the underlying ''tuple-like'' object of iterators to elements of adapted views.

@1@ Returns:
* {{c|1= x.current_ == y.current_}} if {{c|/*all-bidirectional*/&lt;Const, Views...&gt;}} is true.
* Otherwise, {{c|true}} if there exists an integer {{c|1= 0 &lt;= i &lt; sizeof...(Views)}} such that {{c|1= bool(std::get&lt;i&gt;(x.current_) == std::get&lt;i&gt;(y.current_))}} is true.
* Otherwise, {{c|false}}.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return x.current_ &lt;=&gt; y.current_;}}.
